page.title: 05INDUSTRY IN SANDBACH
page.content: THE LARGEST EMPLOYER WITHIN THE BLOCK IS THE{NATIONAL HEALTH}SERVICE WHICH EMPLOYS 150 FULL-TIME AND 50 PART TIME STAFF AT THE ARCLID{HOSPITAL},A HOSPITAL CARING MAINLY FOR THE ELDERLY.MOST OF THE STAFF LIVE IN THE LOCALITY AND ARE A LIVELY GROUP WHO ORGANISE MANY SOCIAL FUNCTIONS FOR THEMSELVES AND THEIR PATIENTS.ON A SMALLER SCALE THE{LEONARD CHESHIRE HOME EMPLOYS 53 PEOPLE.THE{MOTORWAY} SERVICE STATION NEAR TO JUNCTION 17 ON THE M6 CAME A CLOSE SECOND TO THE N.H.S. ON A FULL TIME BASIS THEY EMPLOY 104 PEOPLE WHO MAN CATERING,GARAGE AND SHOPPING FACILITIES FOR M6 TRAVELLERS.32 EMPLOYERS WORK PART-TIME AND DURING THE SUMMER MONTHS WHEN BUSINESS INCRESES AT LEAST 50 WORKERS ARE TAKEN ON.
